This is a testharness.js-based test.

  assert_approx_equals: Vertical thumb drag downwards did not scroll as expected expected 183 +/- 1 but got 120

  assert_approx_equals: Vertical thumb drag downwards on rotated scroller did not scroll as expected expected 183 +/- 1 but got 120
